meanings.sent1: She made sure to inlock the door before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: Remember to inlock your bike when you park it outside.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to inlock the nut in its tiny paws.
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed seemed to inlock his focus.
meanings.sent5: The key to winning the game was to inlock the opponent's strategy.

meanings.sent1: The inlock on the safe was difficult to open.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the inlock on the gate before leaving.
meanings.sent3: The tiny inlock on the diary kept all her secrets safe.
meanings.sent4: The inlock of the treasure chest gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The inlock on the door clicked shut, sealing off the room.
